body_html:
You definitively need to support AMD's GPU natively asap in my opinion:

  • they are leader on free remote GPU clustering
  • there are thousands of crypto mining datacenters that will be converted to lowcost GPU farms in the next following years (they all use AMD's GPU)
    Not supporting AMD's GPU is not strategic if your aim is massive adoption of tensorflow.
